inclusion.criterion: Klinefelter or Turner syndrome as confirmed by genetic testing
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sufficient knowledge of the Dutch language to complete the questionnaires
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: KS: Patients not under treatment in the EMC, AMC or VUmc or no planned visits during the study period
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: TS: No laboratory values or no questionnaires available in patient records
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe psychiatric or neurologic disorders or other reasons for inability to complete the questionnaires as assessed by the treating physician.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, obese and mentally retarded.
